anya-e0703n7:3: Vijayo so mahārājā, vasse antimake ṭhito;
anya-e0703n7:4: Iti cintayi ‘‘vuddho’haṃ, na ca vijjati me suto.
anya-e0703n7:6: Kicchena vāsitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ, nasseyya mama accaye;
anya-e0703n7:10: Lekhaṃ datvāna vijayo, na cirena divaṅgato.
anya-e0703n7:12: Tasmiṃ mate amaccā te, pekkhantā khattiyāgamaṃ;
anya-e0703n7:16: Ekaṃ vassaṃ ayaṃ laṃkā-dīpo āsi arājako.
anya-e0703n7:19: Accayena sumitto so, rājā tassa suto ahu.
anya-e0703n7:21: Tassa puttā tayo āsuṃ, maddarājassa dhītuyā;
anya-e0703n7:22: Dūtā sīhapuraṃ gantvā, rañño lekhaṃ adaṃsu te.
anya-e0703n7:24: Lekhaṃ sutvāna so rājā, putte āmantayī tayo;
anya-e0703n7:25: Ahaṃ mahallako tātā, eko tumhesu gacchatu.
anya-e0703n7:27: Laṃkaṃ nekaguṇaṃ kantaṃ, mama bhātussa santakaṃ;
anya-e0703n7:28: Tassa’cca yena tattheva, rajjaṃ kāretu sobhanaṃ.
anya-e0703n7:37: Te paribbājake disvā, jano sakkari sādhukaṃ.
anya-e0703n7:39: Pucchitvā nagaraṃ ettha, upayantaṃ kamena te;
anya-e0703n7:43: Khattiyā’gamanaṃ tassa, so byākāsi paraṃpi ca.
anya-e0703n7:49: Patte disvāna pucchitvā, amaccā te vijāniya.
anya-e0703n7:55: Ñatvā vināsaṃ sakyānaṃ, so ādāya sakaṃ janaṃ.
anya-e0703n7:58: Māpetvā tattha kāresi, rajjaṃ tassa sute labhi.
anya-e0703n7:64: Pesesuṃ rājino tassa, bhīto rājūhi so pana.
anya-e0703n7:69: Gaṅgāya khipi gaṇhātu, pahu me dhītaraṃ iti;
anya-e0703n7:70: Gahetuṃ te na sakkhiṃsu, nāvāsāpana sīghagā.
anya-e0703n7:73: Pattāpabbajitā kārā, sabbā tā tattha otaruṃ.
anya-e0703n7:78: Nemittakassa vacanaṃ, sutvā tatthā’gatā tu tā;
anya-e0703n7:79: Disvā amacco pucchitvā, ñatvā rañño samappayi.
